page.title: 13Farming
page.content:
All the farmland is managed by 1 family.{The farm consists of 1403 {hectares}and is divided into 4 departments: arable; cattle; pigs and workshop. Also 2 men are employed full time on fencing, and 1 handiman for building and maintenance work. 1 full time and 2 part time secretaries organise the office.
Cattle: It consists of{2 herds of {Friesians}(330 head in all) producing about{6200 litres/day of milk.
Pigs: It consists of{1202 sows and {64 gilts.}The breeding stock used are {Camborough Blue sows}crossed with pure {Large White boars.
cont on P14
